global.debugger_title: Nosey Parkers done got access to special dev commands like /debug.
global.trusted_title: Folks who reckon they can be trusted got limited access to staff commands like /kick and /ban.
global.staff_title: Staff fellers got access to all them staff commands.
global.senior_staff_title: Senior Jamboree have access to all jamboree commands and certain super admin commands like /advanced_metagame.
global.super_title: Super Honchos have access to all commands, excluding developer commands.
global.developer_title: Craftsmen have unrestricted access to all available commands.
global.server_offline: Server done seem to be offline.

global.restricted_to_root: Restricted to the root users, y'all.

search.custom: * By default returns all rows where the column haz yer search. Y'all kin use operators such as: = (equals), != (do nay equal), > (greater thayun), < (less thayun) or ! (hain't got) at the startin' of yer search string. Y'all kin also search fer multiple values by separatin' 'em with a comma.

global.support_markdown: Most basic markdown syntax is supported, y'all. Click to learn more.

statistics.casino_details: Total haul from all them fancy games in the casino.

statistics.ooc_details: How many times folks done talked outta character in the local or global chat.
statistics.reports_details: How many times folks done caused a ruckus and snitched on each other.
statistics.daily_tasks_details: Number of daily tasks ticked off.
statistics.deaths_details: Number of times we bit the dust.
statistics.airlifts_details: Amount o' air-hoists t' the hospital.

statistics.bills_details: Combined amount gone paid fer all them bills.
statistics.dumpsters_details: Amount of stuff folks found in them dumpsters.
statistics.mining_explosions_details: Amoun' o' gems that done went ka-boom whilst bein' dug up.
statistics.daily_refresh_details: Combined 'mount of all paid daily activities refreshes.
statistics.economy_details: Money movements grouped up by type in the las' 7 days.
statistics.bus_revenue_details: Total income from all the cash made drivin' them buses.

show.source_helpful_details: Number of "helpful" deeds this here team member done did in the past month or so. We're talkin' 'bout usin' them commands that's mostly for lendin' a hand to OTHER players like: /tp_player, /tp_here, /tp_to, /spectate, /staffpm, /wipe, /freeze, /unfreeze, /job, /reset_job, /revive and /revive_range (just them for the others), not includin' the ones more often than not used for messin' 'round with other staff, like /slap and /damage, y'hear?

metadata.title: Fancy Log-Entry metadata
metadata.secondary_unknown: We ain't got no clue 'bout the secondary death reason.
metadata.secondary_player: Sum feller killed the player with the server-id {0}.
metadata.secondary_npc: Some ol' NPC killed the player.

detail.title: In-depth explanation for leaving
detail.description: This will go into more detail 'bout how user '{0}' called it quits in the game.
detail.read_more: Want to know more 'bout why folks leave? Click here...

reasons.exited: The user said 'adios' by typin' 'quit' in the F8 console or pressin' ALT and F4 or somethin' like that.
reasons.disconnected: The user done gone and disconnected from the server by typin' 'disconnect' in the F8 console or similar.
reasons.crash: The users game done crashed with the given error message.
reasons.timeout: The users connection to the server done timed out. This is usually the case when internet connectivity done drops out.
reasons.banned: The user done got banned by a staff member with the give reason.
reasons.restart: The user done got kicked by the server as it was fixin' to restart.
reasons.kicked: The user got their tail kicked by a staff member with a mighty fine reason.
reasons.job: The users job priority done run out. This here means the user done waited in the queue for too dang long, so the system kicked 'em out.
reasons.doors: The server tried to sync up them there doors with the client, but couldn't quite pull it off. So it reckon it kicked the user 'cause it can't wrangle back from that there error.
reasons.global: The system done caught wind that the user was more'n likely up to no good, so it slapped 'em with a ban that's fierce as a tornado in a trailer park.
reasons.editor: The player done go'n and opened up their Rockstar Editor which automatically kicks 'em outta the server y'all in.
reasons.overflow: Safety measure by FiveM to prevent them cheaters from floodin' yer server with all them events.
reasons.another: This here user went directly connectin' to another server without first disconnectin' from this here one.
reasons.config: While connectin', the servers configuration couldn't load, so the user got turned away.
reasons.unknown: Sorry y'all, but I cain't provide no fancy details 'bout this one! Y'all can ask a developer for some more help if ya need it.
